opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Barnard v. Collins, Director, Texas Department of Criminal Justice, Institutional Division

opinion:
510 U.S. 1102

Barnard
v.
Collins, Director, Texas Department of Criminal Justice, Institutional Division.

No. 93-7689 (A-631).

Supreme Court of United States.

February 1, 1994.

1

Appeal from the C. A. 5th Cir.

2

Application for stay of execution of sentence of death, presented to JUSTICE SCALIA, and by him referred to the Court, denied. Certiorari denied. JUSTICE BLACKMUN would grant the application for stay of execution. Reported below: 13 F. 3d 871.
